description:
Racing mountain bikes, which you have not seen!

Get down scenic trails, swept through the rocks and tree roots, making huge jumps, performing a combination of crazy stunts, opening new bikes and gear, and become this extreme!
Unprecedented physics engine gives you a level of control that you have not even dreamed of! Go down the steep slopes of the mountains on your mountain bike, do the crazy jumping to a great height and speed. Downhill and cross bikes, bike for trial, motorcycles, sport bikes, choppers and many other types of two-wheeled technology, which will help to choose the style of driving that you are most like!

Perform crazy stunts, do amazing back flips and front coup exciting to get the highest rating! All you need to do is to get high scores in the game to unlock the sport bikes and be the best biker.

Feel the thrill! Perform dangerous stunts! The game has realistic physics, traced bikes and all this under the wonderful music tracks. The race on the bike has never been so much fun! Speed ​​is important in this game, so you'll be well dispersed before the big jump and perform insane stunts. Use your mountain bike to jump over obstacles. Magnificent cycling and crazy adventures 2D freestyle. An exciting game in 2017. Sit on the bike and finish the level without crashing and falling.

Experience realistic physics and an active suspension of your bike, swallows bumps in the road, and after softening the landing big jumps and drops.

The high speed and huge jumps lead to a terrible fall, after which your driver helplessly rolling down the hill like a puppet.

Share the results of their races with friends. Let them try to beat your scores!

Features:

- 100+ scenic mountain trails for all riding styles
- Addictive gameplay
- Upgrades bike
- Realistic physics
- Crazy addictive game with smooth tilt controls
- Play for any device, including tablets
- Downhill and cross bikes
- Crazy stunts mountain bike
- Great gameplay
- Lovely background sounds
- A cool 2D graphics
- Free Game

How to play:
Manage the arrows on the side to go to the phone, to accelerate and brake.
To overcome the mountain tops, perform crazy stunts on bikes. Reach the finish line unscathed.
